quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction explicitly mentions replacing the fridge's brand logo with "Xu's Fresh Zone." This involves identifying the brand logo area and confirming it's replaced correctly.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the refrigerator's brand logo been changed to "Xu's Fresh Zone"?

quality_check_questions.question: Have any additional parts of the refrigerator's design or logo been altered besides changing the brand logo?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Confirming the visibility and clarity of "Xu's Fresh Zone" ensures proper execution of the replacement.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the new "Xu's Fresh Zone" text clear and legible on the refrigerator?
